#!/usr/bin/env ruby $KCODE = 'U'
$char_to_entity = { } File.open("#{ENV['TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT']}/entities.txt").read.scan(/^(\d+)\t(.+)$/) do |key, value| $char_to_entity[[key.to_i].pack('U')] = value end
def encode (text) text.gsub(/[^\x00-\x7F]|["'<>&]/) do |ch| ent = $char_to_entity[ch] ent ? "&#{ent};" : sprintf("&#x%02X;", ch.unpack("U")[0]) end end
print encode(STDIN.read)
